actions.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A004) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment considered as adopted: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A004) Agreed to without objection.

description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 951, the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Natural Resources is considered adopted and pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 953, the further amendment specified in section 5 is considered adopted.
